#### FAQ

We will be building up a Frequently Asked Questions section as soon as we recieve questions from YOU! Please e-mail your questions to [The Nature Conservancy's LANDFIRE e-mail.](mailto:landfire@tnc.org)  



<br>


#### Getting help

If you need help with LANDFIRE data, contact helpdesk@landfire.gov.

If you need help with Syncrosim software, try posting a question on the [SyncroSim forum](https://syncrosim.com/forums/){target='blank'}.

* [LANDFIRE BpS model download](http://www.landfirereview.org/search.php){target='blank'}
* [LANDFIRE homepage](https://www.landfire.gov/){target='blank'}
* [LANDFIRE Guides and Tutorials](https://www.conservationgateway.org/ConservationPractices/FireLandscapes/LANDFIRE/Library/Pages/library.aspx){target='blank'}
* [ApexRMS](https://www.conservationgateway.org/ConservationPractices/FireLandscapes/LANDFIRE/Library/Pages/library.aspx){target='blank'} (website for SyncroSim software)
* [SyncroSim documentation](http://docs.syncrosim.com/){target='blank'}
* [SyncroSim publications](http://docs.stsim.net/publications.html){target='blank'}
